about_the_game:
State-of-the-art Fully-Voiced AI-Powered Dialogue

Every line of dialogue from every character is completely dynamic, generated with the most sophisticated AI-models and realistic emotion-filled speech. Engage in realistic conversations where you can speak freely and must determine exactly what you need to say to get through immersive scenarios while grappling with the psychological challenges posed by a decaying mind and a lurking subconscious.




  • Thought Reading: Utilize the power of an artifact to read thoughts, offering a unique insight that aids in navigation and decision-making.

Engaging Scenarios

  • Complex Interactions: From light-hearted moments in a bar to high-stress situations like evading arrest, use your wit and the power of thought reading to navigate through varied scenarios.
  • Memory Decay and Anomalies: As time progresses, the increasing decay introduces instabilities in the memory, from fun to horrific. Was that bouncer always three kids in trenchcoat?

Join the Journey Within

As you dive deeper into the subconscious, each interaction, and each decision shapes the path forward. There is no dialogue-tree here, only your intuition guides you through a labyrinth of memories teeming with horrors. Will you uncover the secrets held within before it's too late, or will the fading memories consume you?

Who We Are


We're just a small team of two brothers and a close friend, united by our love for video games and a shared dream to create games that stretch the limits of what's possible. From the sounds and music to the art and everything in between, everything you see and hear in our game is crafted by us. We pour our hearts into every detail, hoping to bring you an experience that resonates and inspires.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains roleplaying situations involving violence, drug usage, and sexual content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel 6th Gen i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or Radeon 5500XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the fragmented psyche of a deceased mind filled with shifting realities and hidden dangers to uncover a powerful artifact. With real-time voiced AI dialogue and atmospheric audio and visuals, each moment is a race against time. Will you unlock the secrets before you lose yourself?
